snippet: Extreme poverty has increased recently among people over age 65.
abstract: Editorial laments news from study by National Women's Law Center, which analyzed Census Bureau report on poverty, showing that from 2011 to 2012 the rate of extreme poverty rose by a statistically significant amount among those 65 and older; contends that it will be devastating if the increase became a growing trend.
lead_paragraph: Extreme poverty has increased recently among people over age 65.
